title: Fifth Avenue Princess
description: When Coco Mint goes for a fabulous job interview at one of New York's b-list fashion magazines she gets more than she bargains for...A LOT MORE! Follow Coco Mint as she discovers love , celeb parties and New York's answer to holocaust victims. To put the cherry on top of the Cosmo she is forced to deal with a boss from hell who just happens to be stuck in the 1920's and her boss's witty and bitchy gay assistant who has a Lady Gaga obsession.Will she survive and keep her title as a New York Fifth Avenue princess?*This is Short story series. A new book is out every week...
author: Alessandra Mountbatten
